title: Expand holographic effects across cart page and homepage elements

requirements.summary: Apply holographic gradient effects to cart items including iridescent borders and hover shimmer
acceptanceCriteria: Cart item containers display iridescent gradient borders
Cart items show subtle holographic background shimmer effect on hover
Effects use brand color #a932bd and complement existing holographic design patterns
Animation is smooth and matches the timing of other holographic effects

file_operations.description: Add holographic border effects using animated gradients to cart item containers. Add hover state with subtle holographic background shimmer effect. Use brand color #a932bd in gradient definitions. Ensure animations match timing of existing holographic effects (as seen in ProductCard, Layout header, and MegaMenu). Apply CSS classes or inline styles consistent with the existing holographic pattern from index.css.

Add new CSS utility classes or keyframe animations for cart item holographic effects if they don't already exist. Define iridescent border gradient animations and hover shimmer backgrounds using the brand color #a932bd. Ensure consistency with existing holographic animation definitions.

requirements.summary: Add holographic gradient effects to homepage feature cards with animated borders and shimmer backgrounds
acceptanceCriteria: Feature cards display animated holographic border effects
Subtle holographic background gradients are visible on the feature cards
Effects complement existing holographic elements and use the brand color palette
Hover states enhance the holographic shimmer effect

file_operations.description: Apply holographic gradient effects to the three feature cards (vanguardist design, artistic expression, inclusive fashion). Add animated iridescent borders using brand color #a932bd. Add subtle holographic background gradients that create shimmer effects. Enhance hover states to intensify the holographic shimmer. Use CSS classes or styling patterns consistent with existing holographic elements in ProductCard and MegaMenu.

requirements.summary: Apply holographic effects to quantity controls and remove buttons with animated gradient borders
acceptanceCriteria: Increment and decrement buttons display holographic border effects
Remove button shows iridescent gradient animation
Hover and active states enhance the holographic shimmer
Effects maintain consistency with other interactive elements

file_operations.description: Add holographic border effects to increment and decrement quantity control buttons. Add iridescent gradient animation to the remove button using brand color #a932bd. Enhance hover and active states with increased holographic shimmer intensity. Ensure effects are consistent with other interactive elements like the cart icon and navigation buttons.

requirements.summary: Add holographic gradient effects to checkout/total price section emphasizing the call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Total price section displays prominent holographic border effect
Subtle holographic background gradient enhances visual hierarchy
Effects draw attention to the checkout area without overwhelming the content
Design maintains readability of price information

file_operations.description: Add holographic border effect to the total price container using animated iridescent gradients with brand color #a932bd. Add subtle holographic background gradient to enhance visual hierarchy and draw attention to the checkout area. Ensure effects maintain readability of price information. Use CSS patterns consistent with existing holographic effects in the application.
